EmailTemplate.subject: We Hope You Enjoyed Our Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> We Hope You Enjoyed Your Day
Every aspect of the day was designed to show how grateful we are for customers like you.
Regards,
Darryl Langdon, District Sales Manager
Please help us improve future events by sending feedback to darryllangdon@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:darryllangdon@grandandtoy.com]]>. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
